Package org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler

Class Summary
AbortJob This class is used during testing.
AddScheduledTime This class is used during testing.
BaseCrawlerInitializationCommand  
ChangeJobDocSpec This class is used during testing.
CheckConfigured This class is used during testing.
DefineJob This class is used during testing.
DefineRepositoryConnection This class is used during testing.
DeleteJob This class is used during testing.
DeleteRepositoryConnection This class is used during testing.
ExportConfiguration This class provides a script hook to export the crawler configuration to a file.
FindJob This class converts a job name into a job identifier.
GetJobSchedule This class gets the schedule records associated with a job.
ImportConfiguration This class provides a script hook to allow import of crawler configuration information from a file.
ListJobs This class lists all jobs presently being handled by the connector framework.
ListJobStatuses This class lists the status of all jobs presently being handled by the connector framework.
PauseJob This class is used during testing.
Register Register a repository connector class
RestartJob This class is used during testing.
RunDocumentStatus This class runs a document status report.
RunMaxActivityHistory Generate a maximum activity report.
RunMaxBandwidthHistory This class runs a maximum bandwidth history report
RunQueueStatus This class runs a queue status report.
RunResultHistory This class runs a result history report.
RunSimpleHistory This class converts a job name into a job identifier.
StartJob This class is used during testing.
SynchronizeConnectors Un-register all registered repository connector classes that can't be found

UnRegister Un-register a repository connector class
